mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPEN_PROJECT(OP_CODE, OP_RECR_NUM, OP_TITLE, OP_CONTENT, OP_DATE, OP_VIEW , OP_START_DATE, OP_END_DATE, OP_TEAM_NAME, OP_MEET_CODE, OP_CAR_CODE, OP_MEM_CODE, OP_CAT_CODE, OP_SIGG_CODE) VALUES('OP_'||TO_CHAR(OPEN_PROJECT_SEQ.NEXTVAL+50), #{mojibsu}, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT , #{startDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{teamname} , #{meetcode}, #{carcode}, #{memcode}, #{catcode}, #{siggcode})
